response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am excited to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our premium product. This extraordinary item holds immense value to me, and I believe it would also be a significant addition to your collection or business. Given its worth to both parties, I propose a transaction price of $900,000. This offer reflects my desire to ensure a mutually beneficial exchange while maximizing the value I receive for this exceptional product. I look forward to discussing the details further with you. Kind regards, Alice", "product_price": 900000}
